episodes.title: How the pox of Trump's dictatorship has infected our lives - with Dr Steven Hassan.
episodes.description: Dr Steven Hassan joins Anthony Davis to discuss how the pox of Donald’s dictatorship has affected our minds, the collective sadness we feel at ICE violence and official gaslighting and what we can do to improve our anxiety about the collapse of democracy under the Trump regime - only on The Weekend Show. episodes.title: LIVE: Ex-Fundamentalist BLOWS WHISTLE on MAGA Religious CULT | The Weekend Show
episodes.description:
Author Tia Levings joins Anthony Davis to discuss her escape from Christian evangelical patriarchy, religious trauma and the Trad wife life. She decodes the fundamentalist influence in Trump’s government, from Project 2025 to the MAGA cult that has been brainwashed to follow his rampant authoritarianism - only on The Weekend Show.

episodes.title: Dr Steven Hassan exposes the psychological operation to help Trump win the election.
episodes.description: Cult expert Dr Steven Hassan joins Anthony Davis to analyze the emotional cost of the transition of power considering Trump’s insane cabinet picks, and the successful psychological operation to help swing the election in favor of MAGA Republicans by the super-rich oligarchy - only on The Weekend Show.
